about_the_game:
In the world of "Heart Beat Clue", every turn might bring a spark of romance or a perplexing puzzle waiting for your solution. Imagine yourself clad in a detective's trench coat, magnifying glass in hand, walking through the mysteriously vibrant city streets, where every female protagonist you meet could be the cause of your heart fluttering or the key to unraveling a mystery. In this game that blends live-action video elements with detective puzzles in a romantic narrative setting, you're not just searching for clues to solve cases but also seeking that potentially fleeting love.

Your choices will determine everything: Will you maintain a cool detective's heart, focused on uncovering the truth, or let the stirrings of your heart guide you closer to them? Every decision will affect the development and outcome of the story, offering a unique gaming experience. Every player becomes the author of their own romantic detective saga.

Join this adventure filled with love and mysteries now! Explore the clues that make your heart beat, pinpoint the suspects of love, and experience an unprecedented joy of gaming.

Join our Discord at https://discord.gg/sQy6CmEGZc
